sentences.en: At some point maybe we'll collaborate - but not only with Pentax.
sentences.cn: 某种程度(译者:这个就模糊了)我们会有合作,但是不只是宾得.

sentences.en: Collaborate and share documents on your company's internal Web site.
sentences.cn: 协作并在您的公司内部网站上共享文档.

sentences.en: Collaborate with other assessors in an effort to better understand the assessment.
sentences.cn: 与其他评估者合作以更好地理解评估结果.

sentences.en: Collaborate with technical department engineers, production supervisors, shop - workers, and others.
sentences.cn: 与技术部门工程师 、 生产主管 、 和车间工人等协同合作.

sentences.en: Don't collaborate with the Chunguang land agent.
sentences.cn: 不要和春光房地产商勾结.

sentences.en: During the late seventies, he collaborated with the legendary Muddy Waters.
sentences.cn: 70年代后期，他和大名鼎鼎的马迪•沃特斯合作过。

sentences.en: I would ask you to collaborate with us in this work.
sentences.cn: 我们愿意请你们在这项工作中和我们合作.

sentences.en: Much later he collaborated with his son Michael on the English translation of a text on food production.
sentences.cn: 后来他和儿子迈克尔合作，把一个有关食品生产的文本翻译成英语。

sentences.en: Students can collaborate together at great distances, share ideas.
sentences.cn: 学生能在很棒的距离一起合作, 部份主意.

sentences.en: The corporate bodies collaborate elaborately on producing vibrating evaporator.
sentences.cn: 法人团体在生产振动蒸发器之后精心制作协作.

sentences.en: The main aim now is to find a company to collaborate with.
sentences.cn: 现在的主要目标是找到一家公司合作.

sentences.en: The team which members collaborate will produce endless strength.
sentences.cn: 两个人以上为明确的目标同心协力,将产生无穷的力量.

sentences.en: The two nations are collaborating on several satellite projects.
sentences.cn: 两国在几个人造衞星项目上展开合作。

sentences.en: The work gets done more quickly when we collaborate.
sentences.cn: 我们一旦合作,工作做起来就更快了.

sentences.en: Thirdly, we collaborate to design a simulation platform of cellular system.
sentences.cn: 第三, 参与搭建了CDMA系统仿真平台.

sentences.en: To collaborate with Compliance Engineers to provide Regulatory advice and guidance.
sentences.cn: 与符合性工程师合作提供法规的建议和指导.

sentences.en: We would ask you to collaborate with us.
sentences.cn: 我们愿意请你们和我们合作.

words.tran_cn: [劳经] 合作者；勾结者；通敌者

trans.tran_en: to work together with a person or group in order to achieve something, especially in science or art

trans.tran_cn: 合作， 协作； 勾结
trans.tran_en: to work together with a person or group in order to achieve something, especially in science or art
